EmailTemplate.name: AccountReValidationEmail_Archive
EmailTemplate.subject: MyAerospace Account Revalidation Required
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MyAerospace Account Revalidation Required
Dear {!Portal_Honeywell_ID__c.ContactName__c},
Thank you for using MyAerospace. For the security of the company you represent, your username,"{!Portal_Honeywell_ID__c.Name}" must be validated before the following date
{!Portal_Honeywell_ID__c.Revalidation_Date__c}.
If you fail to validate your account in a timely manner, your MyAerospace account will become inactive and you will be unable to sign in.
You can revalidate your account at the following link:
Link for the revalidation and follow the instructions provided.
Note:
This email is being sent from an unmonitored mailbox. If you need further assistance, please contact a customer support team member at:
1-800-601-3099 US / Canada (Toll Free) 1-602-365-3099 International Choose Option 7 (Web Support)
Thank You, Honeywell Aerospace Customer Support Team
